issue.title: [R] Add examples to the datasets documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11729](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11729). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are currently very few examples in the documentation (we have some in vignettes, though those have a slightly different audience). 

One specific addition would be to show how `group_by(vars) %>% write_dataset(...)` is the same as `write_dataset(..., partitioning = c(vars))`
